original_text:
For he finds fault with them when he says:
“Behold, the days are coming, declares the Lord,
    when I will establish a new covenant with the house of Israel
    and with the house of Judah,
korean_text: 그들의 잘못을 지적하여 말씀하시되 주께서 이르시되 볼지어다 날이 이르리니 내가 이스라엘 집과 유다 집과 더불어 새 언약을 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: For he finds fault with them when he says:
when I will establish a new covenant with the house of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘 집과 새 언약을 세울 때

sentences.original_text: and with the house of Judah,
